description: This file defines theming for a Flutter application, specifically providing a Material 3 theme configuration called AppTheme, including color schemes, widget themes, and styling constants.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static methods and constants to generate a consistent app-wide Material 3 theme using predefined colors and styles.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with the app's custom color scheme and style configurations for a light theme.
